alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 3:47PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion and southwestern Putnam Counties through 430 PM EST... At 346 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ocala, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Citra, Hawthorne, Lake Delancy, Sparr, Anthony, Orange Springs, Ocala Airport and Reddick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam
